Hi Ashok,

I'm having the same problems with the toolbar buttons. I'm working on a solution that involves wrapping the buttons to a new line when they don't fit. There's a good amount of code that needs to be modified to get it working so I don't know how soon it will be ready. In the mean-time, your only option is to dive into the code and remove those buttons that you don't need.

Thanks,
Rob

If you try testing with a simple master page then add parts of your master page that's causing the trouble piece by piece, you might be able to track down what is specifically causing the dropdown lists to appear outside the RTE. If you do find out, let us know and we'll see what we can do.

Thanks,
Rob
